title: Jira API Get Favourite Filters Operation Response Schema
description: Schema representing the output of the get favourite filters operation in Jira API

id.id: The unique identifier for the filter.

subscriptions.id: A paginated list of the users that are subscribed to the filter.

max-results.id: The maximum number of results that could be on the page.

end-index.id: The index of the last item returned on the page.

start-index.id: The index of the first item returned on the page.

size.id: The number of items on the page.e

jql.id: The JQL query for the filter.

name.id: The name of the filter. Must be unique.

owner.id: The user who owns the filter.

emailAddress.description: The email address of the user.

48x48.description: The URL of the item's 48x48 pixel avatar.

24x24.description: The URL of the item's 24x24 pixel avatar.

16x16.description: The URL of the item's 16x16 pixel avatar.

32x32.description: The URL of the item's 32x32 pixel avatar.

timeZone.description: The time zone specified in the user's profile.

displayName.description: The display name of the user.

sharePermissions.id: The groups and projects that the filter is shared with.

id.id: The unique identifier of the share permission.

project.id: The project that the filter is shared with.

projectTypeKey.id: The project type of the project.

assigneeType.id: The default assignee when creating issues for this project.

roles.id: The name and self URL for each role defined in the project.

self.id: The URL of the project details.

avatarUrls.id: The URLs of the project's avatars.

48x48.description: The URL of the item's 48x48 pixel avatar.

24x24.description: The URL of the item's 24x24 pixel avatar.

16x16.description: The URL of the item's 16x16 pixel avatar.

32x32.description: The URL of the item's 32x32 pixel avatar.

searchUrl.id: A URL to view the filter results in Jira

favourite.id: Whether the filter is selected as a favorite.

sharedUsers.id: A paginated list of the users that the filter is shared with.

max-results.id: The maximum number of results that could be on the page.

end-index.id: The index of the last item returned on the page.

start-index.id: The index of the first item returned on the page.

size.id: The number of items on the page.

viewUrl.id: A URL to view the filter results in Jira, using the ID of the filter.

statusCode.description: HTTP status code of the API response.

headers.description: HTTP headers of the API response.
